name: fasten-health
description: Fasten On-Prem is a self-hosted personal health record system that aggregates medical data from providers and patient portals into one interface, giving individuals full control and long-term storage of their health history.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Full control of medical records. Privacy-focused storage

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Keep your health history forever. Never lose important data

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync from multiple healthcare sources. Comprehensive view

features.title: Document Storage
features.description: Store test results and images. Complete records

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find medical information quickly. Efficient access
